description: PEG Logbook.json — Consolidated changelog and journal for all session, mutation, and audit events.

changelog.event: Consolidated files into new PEG 8-file architecture
Added Knowledge.json and Journal.json for expanded documentation and innovation tracking
GitHub integration verified with repo Matthewtgordon/PEGGPT
PromptEngineer.txt written and committed to GitHub
Knowledge.json format upgraded and rules expanded
Tasks.json merged with legacy audit checklist
Tests.json merged — restored full example and edge cases
PEG scoring rules re-enabled in SessionConfig
PEG_HardTest_01 applied: Pre-mutation check node, loop protection, and new tag definitions inserted.

journal.entry: Uploaded and extracted all consolidated PEG JSON files for new agentic baseline.
Outlined snippet-merge utility and in-chat JSON merge process for file updates.
System migrated to 8-file lean structure with new modules: PromptModules, Workflows, Examples, Edge_Cases, Notes, Changelog, Knowledge, Journal.
Added Journal.json for comprehensive running diary, build progress, story log, and future innovations tracking.
Ready to capture further build ideas, autonomous test plans, research questions, and meta-narrative for PEG-aware story.

future_plans.plan: Automate macro mutation and test chaining
Integrate persistent knowledge base for rapid agentic learning
Expand fallback and recovery logic for all modules
Track all deviations and completion for every mutation until closure

deviations_log.description: Legacy prompt modules merged for new baseline—old structure deprecated.
